name: Dreamcatcher (itch) (JohnGabrielUK)
description:
A resting mind is a vulnerable one. In Dreamcatcher, you must protect your charge against those who would assail them as they rest...

The game can be played with the arrow keys, the mouse, or a gamepad.

Dreamcatcher was made for the fifty-fifth Godot Wild Jam.
Due to time constraints, it is very short and quite unpolished.
